com.lift.game.view.actors

Class EntityActor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
      • com.lift.game.view.actors.EntityActor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ElevatorActor, PersonActor, PlatformActor, PowerUpActor

    public abstract class EntityActor
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
    Holds a sprite's position based on the respective entity model.
